title: Empire of One
description: EMPIRE OF ONE is an epic adventure that evokes an ancient time of folklore and mysticism just out of reach of the naked eye. A lyrical prose and fluid first-person narrative provides a deeply sensory experience that is immediately absorbing, full of intense battle sequences and breathless chases through a well-crafted, intricate backdrop of layered arcana.EMPIRE OF ONE, the first installment of Thaine Chase’s new Fantasy/SciFi series, which includes heroes and villains inspired by the Irish mythological epic, Lebor Gabála Érenn.
author: Thaine Chase
